languages.text: "Вы участвовали в казни ставленника Администратума без соответствующего разрешения со стороны последнего. Также вы позволили пленить себя, чем поставили под угрозу выполнение миссии и рисковали ценным оборудованием, выданным вам Адептус Арбитес. Кроме того, вы санкционировали решение по десятине, которое влечет за собой негативные последствия для Империума". {n}Старуха выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Это все. Приступайте к самооценке".

"You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."
languages.original_text: "Вы участвовали в казни ставленника Администратума без соответствующего разрешения со стороны последнего. Также вы позволили пленить себя, чем поставили под угрозу выполнение миссии и рисковали ценным оборудованием, выданным вам Адептус Арбитес. Кроме того, вы санкционировали решение по десятине, которое влечет за собой негативные последствия для Империума". {n}Старуха выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Это все. Приступайте к самооценке".

traits.locale_text: "You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

"You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and putting in peril the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. Besides, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

"You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

"You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

"You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

"You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

languages.text: "Ihr wart an der Hinrichtung eines Angestellten des Administratums beteiligt, ohne entsprechende Genehmigung. Ihr habt zudem zugelassen, ergriffen zu werden, und dadurch Eure Mission gefährdet – sowie die wertvolle Ausrüstung, die die Adeptus Arbites Euch zur Verfügung gestellt haben. Des Weiteren habt Ihr eine Entscheidung bezüglich des Zehnts getroffen, die negative Konsequenzen für das Imperium nach sich zieht." {n}Die alte Frau hält inne.{/n} "Das ist alles. Nun folgt Eure Selbsteinschätzung."
languages.original_text: "You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart an der Hinrichtung eines Angestellten des Administratums beteiligt, ohne entsprechende Genehmigung. Ihr habt zudem zugelassen, ergriffen zu werden, und dadurch Eure Mission gefährdet – sowie die wertvolle Ausrüstung, die die Adeptus Arbites Euch zur Verfügung gestellt haben. Des Weiteren habt Ihr eine Entscheidung bezüglich des Zehnts getroffen, die negative Konsequenzen für das Imperium nach sich zieht." {n}Die alte Frau hält inne.{/n} "Das ist alles. Nun folgt Eure Selbsteinschätzung."

languages.text: « Vous avez participé à l'exécution d'un mandataire de l'Administratum sans autorisation préalable. De plus, en vous laissant capturer, vous avez mis en danger votre mission et le précieux équipement qui vous avait été fourni par l'Adeptus Arbites. Et pour ne rien arranger, vous avez entériné une décision relative à la dîme au détriment de l'Imperium. » {n}La vieille femme marque une pause.{/n} « Voilà pour les chefs d'accusation qui pèsent contre vous. À charge pour vous de procéder à votre auto-évaluation. »
languages.original_text: "You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez participé à l'exécution d'un mandataire de l'Administratum sans autorisation préalable. De plus, en vous laissant capturer, vous avez mis en danger votre mission et le précieux équipement qui vous avait été fourni par l'Adeptus Arbites. Et pour ne rien arranger, vous avez entériné une décision relative à la dîme au détriment de l'Imperium. » {n}La vieille femme marque une pause.{/n} « Voilà pour les chefs d'accusation qui pèsent contre vous. À charge pour vous de procéder à votre auto-évaluation. »

languages.text: “你在未经帝国内政部许可的情况下，参与处决内政部任命的官员。你还任由自己遭到俘虏，这不仅对任务本身造成了危害，还威胁到了法务部授予你的贵重设备。更重要的是，你批准了与神圣什一税相关的决定，这为帝国带来了不利的后果。”{n}老妇人顿了顿。{/n}“我要说的只有这些，你可以开始进行自我评价了。”
languages.original_text: "You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

traits.locale_text: “你在未经帝国内政部许可的情况下，参与处决内政部任命的官员。你还任由自己遭到俘虏，这不仅对任务本身造成了危害，还威胁到了法务部授予你的贵重设备。更重要的是，你批准了与神圣什一税相关的决定，这为帝国带来了不利的后果。”{n}老妇人顿了顿。{/n}“我要说的只有这些，你可以开始进行自我评价了。”

languages.text: «Tomó parte en la ejecución de una persona nombrada por el Administratum sin el permiso correspondiente. También ha permitido que l{mf|e|a} capturen, poniendo así en peligro su misión y el valioso equipamiento proporcionado por el Adeptus Arbites. Y, lo que es más, ha autorizado una decisión sobre el diezmo que conlleva consecuencias adversas para el Imperium». {n}La anciana hace una pausa.{/n} «Eso es todo. Prosiga con su autoevaluación».
languages.original_text: "You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

traits.locale_text: «Tomó parte en la ejecución de una persona nombrada por el Administratum sin el permiso correspondiente. También ha permitido que l{mf|e|a} capturen, poniendo así en peligro su misión y el valioso equipamiento proporcionado por el Adeptus Arbites. Y, lo que es más, ha autorizado una decisión sobre el diezmo que conlleva consecuencias adversas para el Imperium». {n}La anciana hace una pausa.{/n} «Eso es todo. Prosiga con su autoevaluación».

languages.text: 「あなたは帝国行政局に任命された者の処刑に、適切な許可なく関与しました。また、自ら捕らえられることを許し、その結果、任務を危険に晒し、高等裁定局から支給された貴重な装備を危険に晒しました。さらに、帝国に不利な結果をもたらす租税に関する決定を承認しました」{n}老女は言葉を切った。{/n}「以上です。自己評価に進んでください」
languages.original_text: "You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは帝国行政局に任命された者の処刑に、適切な許可なく関与しました。また、自ら捕らえられることを許し、その結果、任務を危険に晒し、高等裁定局から支給された貴重な装備を危険に晒しました。さらに、帝国に不利な結果をもたらす租税に関する決定を承認しました」{n}老女は言葉を切った。{/n}「以上です。自己評価に進んでください」

languages.text: "Gerekli izinlere sahip olmamanıza rağmen Administratum'un atadığı bir görevlinin infazında rol aldınız. Üstelik bir de kendinizi yakalatarak görevinizi ve beraberinde Adeptus Arbites'in size zimmetlediği değerli ekipmanları riske atmış oldunuz. Dahası, aşarlara yönelik, İmparatorluk için olumsuz sonuçlara yol açacak bir karara onay verdiniz." {n}Yaşlı kadın duraksıyor. {/n} "Benim söyleyeceklerim bu kadar. Kendi değerlendirmenize geçebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "You took part in the execution of an Administratum appointee without its appropriate permission. You also allowed yourself to be captured, thus endangering your mission and imperilling the valuable equipment issued to you by the Adeptus Arbites. What is more, you sanctioned a tithe-related decision that carries adverse consequences for the Imperium." {n}The old woman pauses.{/n} "That is all. Proceed to your self-evaluation."

traits.locale_text: "Gerekli izinlere sahip olmamanıza rağmen Administratum tarafından atanmış bir görevlinin infazında rol aldınız. Üstelik bir de kendinizi yakalatarak görevinizi ve beraberinde Adeptus Arbites tarafından size zimmetlenmiş değerli ekipmanları riske atmış oldunuz. Dahası, aşarlara yönelik İmparatorluk için olumsuz sonuçlara yol açacak bir karara onay verdiniz." {n}Yaşlı kadın duraksar. {/n} "Benim söyleyeceklerim bu kadar. Kendi değerlendirmenize geçebilirsiniz."
